MeasurementToolMetadata.Description:
Test of Creative Imagery Abilities

Reference:
Jankowska, D. M., & Karwowski, M. (2015). Measuring creative imagery abilities. Frontiers in psychology, 6, 1591.

Assesses creative imagery abilities.

Task:
Completing 7 ambiguous figures in a creative way. No time limit to complete the task. Five raters scored uniqueness, originality, transformativeness.
